DOC.brief_summary: This study is a Phase I, open label study to determine the Maximum Tolerated Dose(MTD) and the Recommended Phase II Dose (RP2D) in patients with advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate Safety, Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Pharmacodynamics (PD) of PQR309
